sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Facing a sharp spike in violence in eastern Ukraine and warnings that Russia plans to invade, Ukraine's President Zelensky has called on Russia's President Putin for a meeting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Civilians are evacuated from pro-Russian rebel-held areas of eastern Ukraine as the breakaway republics order military mobilizations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Storm Eunice sweeps across northwestern Europe, causing at least 14 deaths, extensive property damage, as well as massive power cuts and travel disruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Touring the front line of the nearly eight-year separatist conflict in eastern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The interior minister of the country comes under a shelling attack. The officials flee to a bomb shelter before escaping from the area. Saturday saw more than 1,500 ceasefire violations in eastern Ukraine in a single day, the highest number recorded this year, according to the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Images released by the Russian Defense Ministry show the launch of an intercontinental ballistic missile, a hypersonic cruise missile and a hypersonic land attack missile in a test operation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But Joseph Borrell, high representative on behalf of the EU, says there are no grounds for allegations coming from the Russian-backed eastern Ukraine regions of a possible Ukrainian attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelensky has called on Russia's Vladimir Putin to meet him to find a resolution to the conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I don't know what the Russian president wants, he says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: For this reason, I propose that we meet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, civilians evacuated from the separatist regions of eastern Ukraine are settled in Russian Ministry of Emergency forces and the forces of rebel-held areas

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: in the Donbas region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: On Saturday, top Ukrainian military officials came under fire when taking a tour of the front lines. And now separatist leaders announce a full military mobilization.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I appeal to all the men of the republic who are able to hold weapons in their hands, to stand up for their families, their children, wives, mothers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Together we will achieve the desired and necessary victory for us all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We will protect Donbass and all Russian people. Together, we will achieve the desired and necessary victory for us all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We will protect Donbass and all Russian people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And in the middle, innocent civilians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An evacuation of women, children and retirees to Russia from the Donetsk and Luhansk breakaway republics is now underway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Both claim that a military invasion from Kiev is imminent, although the Ukrainian government has denied this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian President Vladimir Putin personally oversees military drills with his Belarusian counterpart. They involve ballistic missiles such as these. And add to Western fears that they could be used as a cover for an invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Although Moscow has constantly denied this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Yet so far, in Kiev's Maidan Square, scene of the revolution of 2014 that swept away a pro-Russian government, there's a distinct lack of panic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In general, as you can see in the streets of Kiev and other cities, panic. In general, as you can see in the streets of Kyiv and other cities, you know, people have enjoyed this, something that we call reasonable negligence about this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So everybody keeps pretty calm, pretty consolidated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And I think it's a good sign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's a good argument against any sort of military action against Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On the front line, these sounds are now increasingly common.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As the situation deteriorates, many soldiers are braced for the worst.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A large tree crashes onto a double-decker bus near London

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: as storm Eunice ripped through the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The storm's high winds felled trees, cancelled train services and ripped sections off the roof of London's O2 arena. At least four people died in Britain and about 400,000 people were without power. A gust measuring 196 kilometres per hour, thought to be the strongest ever in England, was recorded on the Isle of Wight by the UK weather service.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Storm Zeynep, the second storm hitting Germany in three days, has left three people dead and transport severely disrupted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Two trucks overturned at the Thames Sound Bridge, which connects the island in the Baltic Sea with the mainland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And drivers were rescued from submerged cars on flooded streets in Hamburg as residents dealt with the aftermath of the storm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the Netherlands, four people died as a result of the storms. Train services remained disrupted, with extensive damage to tracks and overhead power lines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Across the country, teams were shifting fallen trees and repairing roofs damaged by the storm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: At this year's Berlinale, one of Europe's most prestigious film festivals,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: the jury presided by filmmaker M. Night Shyamalan awarded the biggest prizes, also called bears, to a majority of female directors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And it's Carla Simon from Catalonia, Spain, that won the supreme award, the Golden Bear for Best Film. Her movie, shot with non-professional actors, takes place over the course of a summer and follows a family of peach growers whose livelihood is threatened when the owner of their land decides to replace the trees with solar panels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: To be honest, the film doesn't really have a happy ending because there's not much hope in family farming at the moment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But I think it's a movie about the importance of taking care of each other and being together in times of need.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: French filmmaker Claire Denis won Best Director award with Both Sides of the Blade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The movie starring French actress Juliette Binoche tells the story of a woman caught between her current partner, actor Vincent Landon, and her ex.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I chose to tell a story with Vincent Landon, Juliette Binoche and Gr√©goire Collin. It's the actors that direct me in my movies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I don't direct them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I really need them and I love them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The German-Turkish actress Meltem Kapten won everyone's hearts at the festival and was awarded Best Lead Performance for her role in Rabia Kurnas vs. George Bush, a true story of a mother's fight to release her wrongly imprisoned son.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I would dedicate this award to Rabia Kurnas and all the mothers whose love is stronger than borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Thank you so much.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Thank you so much.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thank you so much!

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A real life injustice remade as a light comic drama delighted festival goers. The films selected for this year's Berlinale are screening until Sunday evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: China's Sui Wenjing and Han Kong win gold in the pair's figure skating by just 63 hundredths of a point.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The pair, who missed out by another razor-thin margin on the gold four years ago, earned China its ninth gold medal at the Games.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Sweden's Niklas Edin captained the Nordic nations curling team to gold, establishing himself as the most decorated skipper in history. They beat Britain 5-4 in the first extra-end final in Olympic history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Irene Schouten has won an incredible third gold medal at the Beijing Olympics, out-sprinting Canada's Ivany Blondin to win the women's mass start speed skating event.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: She also won the 3,000 and 5,000 metres.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And in the last event of the men's speed skating, Bart Swings of Belgium captures the gold medal in the mass start event.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He improved on the silver he won in Pyeongchang four years ago in a stunning finish.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Russian Alexander Bolshinov sprinted to his third Olympic gold medal, winning a 30km mass start cross-country ski race that was rescheduled and shortened because of strong wind and freezing temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So as things stand at the Games, Norway is in the lead with 15 gold medals, followed by Germany on 11, China on 9 and the USA, Sweden and the Netherlands on 8 each. The two-week Games are set to close on Sunday.
